attributes.action: support Tanzania in adapting agricultural practice, to combat the effects of climate change
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tanzania is one of the poorest countries in the world. They do not pollute the planet greatly, however they are the ones who are affected. An increase in flooding has destroyed crop production and they have only 20 years to adapt the way they farm due to climate change. Tanzania needs other countries to invest resources so that they can work at becoming a developed country.
